name: Untitled Idle Clicker Tower Defence
description:
Untitled Idle Clicker Tower Defence is an idle clicker plus tower defence game where you click on any building to earn gold.

How to Play 

  • Tap on the kingdom to earn gold (Tapping on kingdom give more gold than the rest)
  • tap on any plot to place down a tower;
  • Tap on the tower to remove them from the plot or increase the tower attack speed and earn gold
  • Tap on the enemy to damage them
  • On killing enemy grant you gold depend on the enemy
  • Reach 20000 Gold to win the game

Game is rushed, has missing features and unbalance as I was making this game solo with the help of my friend for the art assets and also the shear amount of assignements I need to complete. But I consider it as success because I've never manage to make a playable game/complete in a game jam before as a solo developer. Hopefully in the future if I ever go solo again I'll be able to finish a simple game.
